content.d: Oh, thank you, Maki-chan. So, you were waiting here for me?
No, that’s not... I mean, yes, I won the... duty of being your escort for today’s party.
Hehe, Maki-chan, you’re so adorable when you’re not being straightforward.
Okay, okay. Now, hurry and escort me.
Aren’t you going to take the hand of today’s star?
